name: EXPRESS DELIVERY!!
description:
If you need your order SUPER FAST this option is for you!!

name: Gift Wrapping!!
description:
Wrapped in hand potato printed brown paper with string, patterned washi tape & a little name card!

If you'd like your purchase gift wrapped for someone special just choose this option & send a message with the person's name & address & a personal message too if you'd like!!

Then we will send it directly to them with their name hand stamped onto the little gift card! 

Perfect for last minute Xmas gifts.

name: Skipper Murray Pillowcase by The Paper Beast
description:
We love Skipper Murray!!

100% Cotton sateen

50 x 70cm

The Paper Beast, aka Carla McRae, is a Melbourne-based illustrator and designer with an affinity for hand-touched graphics. She has been drawing for as long as she can remember; a hobby first fuelled by her passionate childhood crush on Disney's Max Goof and the gushing urge to draw him repetitively. Her work has been published in various Australian media.

name: Dog Tea Towel by I & The Others
description:
I & The Others is a Melbourne based artist. Her work is inspired by this culturally diverse city, weatherbeaten surfaces, spaces and objects, popular culture and sometimes not so popular culture. Her creative practice is an eclectic meld of visual art, illustration, street art & graphic design. Her illustration and street work is well travelled, appearing in places such as Mexico, Israel, New York City, Sydney & Melbourne.

The tea towel is made from a high quality 50% Cotton 50% Linen blend.

50cm x 70cm

name: Coin Purses with pom poms!
description:
These gorgeous coin purses are made with Vintage fabrics hand woven by the HMONG hill tribes of Lanna Country (Northern Thailand). It comes fully lined and with pom poms! 

These bags are handmade in Chiang Mai, Thailand under Fair Trade conditions and are all one-of-a-kind, as the embroidery is never duplicated.

Colours may vary from photo.

Length - 11cm
Height - 9.3cm

Due to the use of vintage fabric that has been up-cycled there might be some imperfections and small stains in the fabric.

Fair Trade is unique and special in the global marketplace. By supporting Fair Trade you actively promote social responsibility while supporting world-wide causes and community development.

name: Owl Pillowcase by Erin Greer - Blue
description:
The pillowcase is made from a high quality 100% Cotton sateen.

50cm x 70cm

Erin Greer is a Melbourne based artist. After early aspirations to become a professional break dancer were cut short due to no skill and a lack of core body strength, Erin found her true calling in artistic pursuits. Erin has studied illustration and painting and employs a variety of mediums to create her dream like imagery, from watercolour to aerosol.
Her work can be viewed at various exhibitions / venues / streets around Melbourne.

dia 69 x H175mm 
volume: 350ml

name: Paris Cats Enamel Storage Box - small. SOLD OUT!
description:
Paris Cats enamel kitchen-storage containers are so lovely, you can use them as serving dishes as well!  Frequently used items can be stored and attractively stacked as these containers are available in three sizes. Plastic lid included. 

**OK for: gas burner & electric burner
**NOT microwave-safe
**after use, hand-wash and dry to maintain best condition
**avoid exposing to sudden shock, as the enamel may crack

volume：380ml 
material: body-enamel;lid-polyethylene

name: Erin Greer's Owl Plate - USUALLY $35!!
description:
Erin Greer is a Melbourne based artist. After early aspirations to become a professional break dancer were cut short due to no skill and a lack of core body strength, Erin found her true calling in artistic pursuits. Erin has studied illustration and painting and employs a variety of mediums to create her dream like imagery, from watercolour to aerosol.
Her work can be viewed at various exhibitions / venues / streets around Melbourne.

The plates are white ceramic 8" x 8" and are microwave & dishwasher safe!!
